title: Is the Halloween mod the greatest mod?
content:
Is the Halloween mod the greatest mod in Keen history?

You vote.

I vote "Yes!" Because, 1) Tricked out graphics for only 16 colors!!! (The skeletons, death sprite, and main sprite - do we need any other reason?) 2) Patches well implimented 3) Tricked out lvl design

I personally think this is the greatest mod ever... now what do you think?Tough Guys Can Fix There Own Problems!!!
[img]http://i15.photobucket.com/albums/a371/najawa/Modding/Prisoner.jpg[/img]
*Under Self Inflicted Posting Restriction*
Visit My site at [url=http://www.najawa.com]www.najawa.com[/url]
[url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?Najawa]Click Here!!! Please!!![/url]
-- NAJAWA --

title: Re: Is the Halloween mod the greatest mod?
content:
I think it's pretty good, one of the best, but not the best. I'm not sure what is the best in my opinion, but it (too bad [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-cheeky.gif[/img] ) isn't this one.
Agree what you said though, the graphics are just awesome, levels cool, et cetera, but this mod has some small bugs and that kind of things that don't look good in my eyes.
Overall, the dark Halloween theme just isn't my favourite, although it looks good.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Is the Halloween mod the greatest mod?
content: It is very good, but some of the levels are a bit too big and repetitive for my liking.  The artwork is very good though, and I do like the unusual sound effects...

title: Re: Is the Halloween mod the greatest mod?
content: From what I've played, it seems to suffer the same problem that most of Benvolio's mods seem to have, in that they're seemingly needlessly reliant on being overly-labyrinthine.[center]<font color="MAROON">TOUGH GUYS DON'T FOLLOW FADS</font>[/center]

title: Re: Is the Halloween mod the greatest mod?
content:
Okay... has anyone read the first post, or did you just read the title, and post a reply?

I asked you to tell me what the 'better' mod is... you're just telling me why this one stinks, without giving me something better to play.Tough Guys Can Fix There Own Problems!!!

title: Re: Is the Halloween mod the greatest mod?
content: Well, personally I think XkyKeen2, for example is better. Or Kidnapped Keen, or Monky Business: An Essence Of Mayhem beta.Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Is the Halloween mod the greatest mod?
content:
I think it's really good, but I don't think you can call it the best

This is sort of off the topic, but I nevercould beat the Halloween mod, because the only thing I have left to get
is the tooth fairy, and she's sitting right there but a cannon is in the way and I can't jump over it. HOw do you pass it?

title: Re: Is the Halloween mod the greatest mod?
content: It's a bug and you need to use god mode to get past it.Eat your veggies!
